arts.ttl: Aston Villa 2-1 Tottenham: Player ratings as Rogers masterclass seals FA Cup win
arts.sum: The impressive Leon Bailey was denied by Kinsky's outstretched right hand in the first quarter of an hour, with Ramsey and Donyell Malen firing other efforts wide and over, before Son Heung-min was denied at point-blank range by Emiliano Martinez after a fizzing ball across the six-yard box by teenager Mikey Moore. Marcus Rashford and Marco Asensio both came on for their Villa debuts, replacing Bailey and Malen, but the game was all about the impressive performance of Rogers, who must surely be on the radar of England manager Thomas Tuchel.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou future: Tottenham Hotspur manager provides update on job after Aston Villa FA Cup exit
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou provides an update on his Tottenham Hotspur future following his side's defeat against Aston Villa in the FA Cup on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford sends nine-word message to Aston Villa fans after Man United outcast played for the first time since DECEMBER in FA Cup win over Spurs
arts.sum: Rashford played his first game in 59 days when he made a cameo in Aston Villa's 2-1 win over Tottenham. Rashford's Villa debut came a week after he sealed a loan move away from United.

arts.ttl: Arsenal & Spurs interested in Kean - Monday's gossip
arts.sum: Arsenal and Spurs interested in Moise Kean, Manchester United and Aston Villa miss out on Fermin Lopez, Barcelona decline offer to sign Joao Felix, plus more.

arts.ttl: Tottenham: Ange Postecoglou has two new problems to solve amid injury crisis
arts.sum: Injuries are a clear issue with the squad but what’s on show on the pitch is alarming

arts.ttl: 'You can judge me - but don't criticise my outstanding Spurs players'
arts.sum: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou says his players have been "outstanding" during a challenging season after their FA Cup loss to Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa star Morgan Rogers sends clear message to new team-mate Marcus Rashford
arts.sum: Aston Villa secured a 2-1 win over Tottenham in the FA Cup on Sunday and were bolstered by the presence of new signings Marcus Rashford and Marco Asensio, who both came off the bench

arts.ttl: Tottenham supporter disrupts BBC FA Cup coverage as Dion Dublin threatens to 'take him outside'
arts.sum: As Dublin, fellow pundit Jermain Defoe, and Joe Hart joined presenter Mark Chapman to dissect the match, persistent banging erupted outside their studio. Former Premier League striker Dion Dublin was involved in an angry confrontation with an irate Tottenham supporter during the BBC's FA Cup broadcast.

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer slams Tottenham star for FA Cup howler amid Ange Postecoglou sack pressure
arts.sum: The Match of the Day pundit said: "What on earth is he doing?" Former Tottenham goalkeeper Joe Hart also criticised Kinsky during the half-time analysis as part of the BBC coverage, suggesting he was playing on emotion, reports the Mirror . Alan Shearer was scathing in his criticism of Tottenham goalkeeper Antonin Kinsky after his blunder led to Aston Villa's opening goal in their FA Cup defeat on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou's full-time gesture to Tottenham fans speaks volumes after FA Cup exit
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou remains defiant and has not lost the support of some Tottenham fans after their season was dealt another blow as Aston Villa knocked them out of the FA Cup
